genetics

Interface IChromosome

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ASCIIChromosome, BinaryChromosome, EquationChromosome, StringChromosome

    public interface IChromosome
    This is an interface for a chromosome. The following methods are mandatory for any class that implements this interface and hence pretends to be a chromosome of any kind.
    Author:
    Jakob Dhondt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IChromosome clone()
      This method returns an exact copy of this chromosome.
      IChromosome crossover(IChromosome c, double crossover_rate)
      This method executes the crossover process between two genes.
      int getFitness()
      This method returns the fitness of a chromosome.
      java.lang.String getGenes()
      This method returns a string of the genes from this chromosome.
      java.lang.String getInfo()
      This method returns detailed information about this chromosome.
      java.lang.String getShortInfo()
      This method returns the essential information about this chromosome.
      void mutate(double mutation_rate)
      This method let's the chromosome mutate according to the given mutation rate.
      void setGenes(java.lang.String new_genes)
      This method allows to set a new string of genes.

    • Method Detail

      • getGenes

        java.lang.String getGenes()
        This method returns a string of the genes from this chromosome. This might be a binary string but as well any other type of string, depending on the implementing subclass of IChromosome.
        Returns:
        The genes of this chromosome.

      • setGenes

        void setGenes(java.lang.String new_genes)
        This method allows to set a new string of genes.
        Parameters:
        new_genes - The new genes that will be set.

      • mutate

        void mutate(double mutation_rate)
        This method let's the chromosome mutate according to the given mutation rate.
        Parameters:
        mutation_rate - The rate that dictates the mutation.

      • crossover

        IChromosome crossover(IChromosome c,
                      double crossover_rate)
        This method executes the crossover process between two genes. The result is a child gene with properties of one or both of the parents.
        Parameters:
        c - The second (parent) chromosome.
        crossover_rate - The rate that dictates the crossover process.
        Returns:
        The new child chromosome that results from the crossover.

      • getFitness

        int getFitness()
        This method returns the fitness of a chromosome.
        Returns:
        An integer value of the fitness of this chromosome.

      • getInfo

        java.lang.String getInfo()
        This method returns detailed information about this chromosome.
        Returns:
        A string with detailed information about this chromosome.

      • clone

        IChromosome clone()
        This method returns an exact copy of this chromosome.
        Returns:
        An exact copy of this chromosome.

      • getShortInfo

        java.lang.String getShortInfo()
        This method returns the essential information about this chromosome.
        Returns:
        A string with the essential information about this chromosome.
